class MoviesListInTheatre extends Component<Props, State>{
    state: State = {
      status: 'LOADING',
      movies: []
    };
    render() {
        let el;
        const { status, movies } = this.state;

        switch (status) {
            case 'LOADING':
                el = (
                    <LoadingIndicator
                        size="large"
                        message="We are loading movies, please wait.."
                    />
                );
                break;
            case 'LOADED':
                el = (
                    <Row xs={1} md={2} lg={6}>
                        {
                            movies.map(
                                movie => (
                                    <Col key={movie.id}>
                                        <MovieListItem
                                            movie={movie} />
                                    </Col>
                                )
                            )
                        }
                    </Row>
                );
                break;
            case 'ERROR_LOADING':
                // el = (
                //     <Alert variant="danger">
                //         {error?.message}
                //     </Alert>
                // );
                break;
        }
        return el;
    }
    componentDidMount(){
      setTimeout(()=> {
        this.setState({
             status: 'LOADED',
             movies: movies
        });
     },3000);
    }
}

export default MoviesListInTheatre;
